name: Atomic Equilibrium
description:
Place platforms and suck cracked ones to traverse the levels on your journey to beat rival scientists in the quest for a material that has perfect conversion of mass to energy.

Guaranteed better gaming experience with an Xbox controller (or another gamepad, but I've only tested it with an Xbox 360 controller).

Available on Mac and Windows.

Keyboard Controls:

A and D and/or Left and Right Arrow keys and Space to Move
Aim with mouse
Left Click to place and Right Click to suck
Esc to pause

Gamepad Controls (only tested with Xbox 360 controller):

Left joystick to move
Right joystick to aim
Right trigger to place
Left trigger to suck
Back button to pause

Two main abilities:

Placing platforms and sucking up different platforms

Features:

Controller support

Two kinds of enemies (one that places platforms and one that moves back and forth)

Different paths to take to complete a level

Difficulty Progression:

Level 1 introduces gaps too large to jump and suckable cracked platforms

Level 2 introduces enemies that stand still and place platforms that block your path

Level 3 introduces environmental hazards (and checkpoints)

Level 4 introduces new enemies which moving back and forth but don’t place platforms

Level 5 has all of the features of previous levels in challenging configurations
